entry.title: DJ Homer V-Neck Tee,
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

Introducing our Unisex Jersey Short Sleeve V-Neck Tee, designed for those who appreciate comfort and style. This tee envelops you in a light and breathable fabric, ideal for casual outings or layered looks. Perfect for everyone, it's a great addition to your wardrobe for everyday wear, travel, or lounging at home. The fresh and trendy vibe makes it a wonderful gift for friends and family during holidays like Christmas, birthdays, or even as a thoughtful gesture for your favorite music lover on special occasions. Celebrate lifeâ€™s moments with this stylish staple that fits seamlessly into any occasion.

Product features
- Made with side seams for enhanced shape retention and structural support.
- Features a ribbed knit collar that maintains its shape and adds elasticity.
- Shoulder tape ensures stability and prevents stretching at the seams.
- Crafted from lightweight, 100% cotton for a soft and comfortable wear.
- Ethically produced by Bella+Canvas, meeting humane and sustainable standards.

Care instructions
- Do not dryclean
- Machine wash: warm (max 40C or 105F)
- Non-chlorine: bleach as needed
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Iron, steam or dry: medium heat

.: Made with 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, a lightweight fabric (4.2 oz/ydÂ² (142 g/mÂ²)) that is easy to layer, breathable. Perfect for active and leisure wear.
